title: Excellent Square Block Of 14 Perches 20 Ft. Aceess 300 Meters Away From Highlevel Rd - 4 Mn. P.P.
details:
This Block Of 14 Perches is Located in the Heart Of Nugegoda On 20 Ft. Wide Tarred Melder Place. Just 500 Meters to Nugegoda Junction.. & to Highlevel Rd is 300 Meters.

Almost Square in Shape . On a High Elevation .Exclusive Neighborhood.
Property is Suitable for Commercial Purpose Also.

Price Quoted above is as indicated by the Owner.
NB: Genuine buyers are encouraged & invited to make reasonable offers after inspection of the Property irrespective of the Price Quoted. Since the Sale will take place at the Best Offer Received.
